trans-unit.source: Represents the options that can be set for an <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대해 설정할 수 있는 옵션을 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter> is used to generate XSD schemas from a type or assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>형식 또는 어셈블리에서 XSD 스키마를 생성 하는 데 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractImporter> to generate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] code from a schema document.

[!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] importing and exporting schemas, see [Schema Import and Export](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Exporting Schemas from Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]스키마, 가져오기 및 내보내기 참조 [스키마 가져오기 및 내보내기](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 및 [클래스에서 스키마 내보내기](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A> property is used by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> to include types that can be read in an object graph.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A>속성은 사용 된 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>개체 그래프에서 읽을 수 있는 형식을 포함 합니다.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions.KnownTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the data contract and known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]데이터 계약 및 알려진된 형식 참조 [데이터 계약 알려진 형식을](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.
[!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]데이터 계약 참조 [를 사용 하 여 데이터 계약](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ExportOptions"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a serialization surrogate.

An implementation of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate"></xref> interface that can be used to customize how an XML schema representation is exported for a specific type.
trans-unit.target: 구현에서 <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate"> </xref> 특정 형식에 대 한 XML 스키마 표현을 내보내는 방법을 사용자 지정 하는 데 사용할 수 있는 인터페이스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of types that may be encountered during serialization or deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Serialization 또는 deserialization 중에 발견할 수 있는 형식의 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The KnownTypes property is used by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> to include types that can be read in an object graph (set using the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property).
trans-unit.target: KnownTypes 속성은 사용는 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>개체 그래프에서 읽을 수 있는 형식을 포함 (사용 하 여 설정 된 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성).</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.KnownTypes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the data contract and known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]데이터 계약 및 알려진된 형식 참조 [데이터 계약 알려진 형식을](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_KnownTypes" name="KnownTypes" href=""></xref> collection that contains types that may be encountered during serialization or deserialization.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_KnownTypes" name="KnownTypes" href=""> </xref> serialization 또는 deserialization 중에 발견할 수 있는 형식을 포함 하는 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: XML schema representations are exported for all the types specified in this collection by the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여이 컬렉션에 지정 된 모든 형식에 대 한 XML 스키마 표현을 내보냅니다는 <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.XsdDataContractExporter"> </xref>합니다.
